pr_title: Update dev docs, create semgrep-core/bin symlink

timeline.message: Update dev docs, create semgrep-core/bin symlink

timeline.bodyText:
What is that? semgrep-core/bin/ actually contains the source files of the main of the binaries (ok bin might not be
the best name).
We need at least to rename bin/Main.ml (the main entry point of semgrep-core) to something else, maybe main/Main.ml?
timeline.author: aryx
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,8 +4,10 @@ all:
 
 	dune build
 	dune build ./_build/default/tests/test.bc
+	test -e bin || ln -s _build/install/default/bin .
